import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import SocketIOClient from 'socket.io-client' import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card' import './chatRoom.css' const ChatRoom = props => { const [text, setText] = useState('') const socket = React.useRef(SocketIOClient.connect("http://localhost:3010/socket")) console.log(socket); // useEffect(() => { // }, []) return (
